entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
